name: Storefront Hooks Cutomizer
author: mikeyarce

sections.description:
The Storefront Hooks Customizer gives you the ability to add content to Storefront’s template hooks through the WordPress Customizer.

This plugin only works with Storefront and Storefront Child Themes

You will be able to add content into the Header, Content, Homepage Template, and Footer sections of the Storefront theme.

Each hook is saved on a per-theme basis, so when you switch themes the options will be blank. If you switch back, you will see the options added back.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the storefront-hooks-customizer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure Storefront or a Storefront Child Theme is Activate
  4. Navigate to Appearance > Customizer and to the “Storefront Hooks” Panel.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the storefront-hooks-customizer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure Storefront or a Storefront Child Theme is Activate
  4. Navigate to Appearance > Customizer and to the “Storefront Hooks” Panel.

Why don’t I see this option in the Customizer?

You probably are not using the Storefront theme or a Storefront Child Theme.

Where did all my settings go?

If you switch themes, your options will be reset. Each option is saved on a per-theme basis. Switching back to the previous theme will show you the options you had saved earlier.

short_description: Hook into Storefront from the Customizer!

You will be able to add content into the Header, Content, Homepage Template, and Footer sections of the Storefront theme.

Each hook is saved on a per-theme basis, so when you switch themes the options will be blank. If you switch back, you will see the options added back.
